00057 // A run-time mask is used so as to enable multipe types.
00058 const unsigned int ADT_INVALID_OPTION_MASK_MISSING_TRANSLATION_TABLE = 0x1;
00059 const unsigned int ADT_INVALID_OPTION_MASK_MISSING_EXPERIMENT_CHP    = 0x2;
00060 
00061 enum ADT_VERBOSE_ENUM {
00062   // ADT_VERBOSE_NULL, 0: quiet, don't output anything. 
00063   ADT_VERBOSE_NULL,        
00064   // ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, 1: the only option respected by the Windows Console
00065   // This means "exceptions" have to be written to this level of verbose.
00066   // The "exception" verbose level is only respected by the command line tools.
00067   ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL,
00068   // ADT_VERBOSE_EXCEPTION, 2: command line only. When used the log messages
00069   // will report to the log file but not the command-line console. Note
00070   // that this behavior is not respected by the Windows console.
00071   // Exceptions for the Windows console must be written ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL.
00072   ADT_VERBOSE_EXCEPTION,
00073   // ADT_VERBOSE_INPUT_FILES, 3: Outputs information related to input files
00074   // that may help with understanding calling. The most common log
00075   // message through out the application. 
00076   ADT_VERBOSE_INPUT_FILES,
00077   // ADT_VERBOSE_CALL, 4: Specific to GeneCall and the calling algorithm.
00078   // Use this to see why a call was made. 
00079   ADT_VERBOSE_CALL,
00080   // ADT_VERBOSE_TMI, 5: Too much information level is used for
00081   // output of common problem touch points in the code base.
00082   // Any verbose level specified > 5 is reduced to 5. There is no level
00083   // greater than TMI. 
00084   ADT_VERBOSE_TMI,
00085 };
00086 
00087 // Environment
00088 class RunTimeEnvironment
00089 {
00090 
00091 public:
00092 
00093   // Program
00094   std::string        m_programName;
00095 
00096   unsigned int       m_invalidOptionsMask;
00097 
00098   // Verbose.h
00099   std::string        m_verboseLogName;
00100   ADT_VERBOSE_ENUM   m_currentVerbosity;
00101 
00102   //Profiling
00103   Profile            m_programTime;
00104 
00105   std::map< std::string, Profile* > m_profiles;
00106 
00107   // Options
00108   ADTOptions        m_adtOpts;
00109 
00110   RunTimeEnvironment() {
00111     m_currentVerbosity = ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL;
00112   };
00113 
00114   ~RunTimeEnvironment() {};
00115 
00116   void initializeRunTimeEnvironment();
00117 
00118   void setVerbosity(ADT_VERBOSE_ENUM level);
00119 
00120   void profilesReport(float totalSeconds = 0);
00121 
00122 };
